feature_model.name: test_fm
feature_model.feature_tree: :r YM_Test(_r) :m POWER SUPPLY(_r_2) :m TUNER and CHANNEL DECODING(_r_3) :m DEMULTIPLEXER and DESCRAMBLING(_r_4) :m AUDIO and VIDEO DECODING(_r_5) :m CONDITIONAL ACCESS(_r_7) :m SECURITY(_r_8) :m PROCESSOR and DATA STORAGE(_r_9) :m DATA INTERFACES(_r_11) :o USB(_r_11_12) :o Wifi(_r_11_13) :o Power Line Control (PLC)(_r_11_14)
